net.nemerosa.ontrack.extension.metrics.influxdb.client

Class InfluxDbHttpSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nemerosa.ontrack.extension.metrics.influxdb.client.InfluxDbHttpSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InfluxDbSender

    public class InfluxDbHttpSender
extends java.lang.Object
implements InfluxDbSender
    An implementation of InfluxDbSender that writes to InfluxDb via the https://github.com/influxdata/influxdb-java/ library.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new http sender given connection details.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InfluxDbHttpSender

        public InfluxDbHttpSender(java.lang.String hostname,
                          int port,
                          java.lang.String database,
                          java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          java.lang.String retentionPolicy,
                          java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timePrecision)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new http sender given connection details.
        Parameters:
        hostname - the influxDb hostname
        port - the influxDb http port
        database - the influxDb database to write to
        username - the influxDb username
        password - the influxDb password
        retentionPolicy - Retention policy to use
        timePrecision - the time precision of the metrics
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception while creating the influxDb sender(MalformedURLException)
